dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3114 IH: Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barber introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the increase in the income threshold used in determining the deduction for medical care.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Helping Families and Seniors Save on Health Care Act of 2013 .

section.header: Repeal of increase in income threshold for determining medical care deduction
section.text: Section 9013 of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (and the amendments made by such section) are hereby repealed, and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 shall be applied and administered as if such section (and amendments) had not been enacted.
